name: Debra Waters
text: This Pizza Hut is the best! The people are great. They are nice, funny, and hard working. This location has never gotten my order wrong, it's always ready before the estimated time, and the customer service is the best! Even when there are several orders on the screen and the store is busy, they make me feel like a priority.

name: Dennis Worthington
text: Great prices,great service. I'll be visiting them again.

name: brittany wallace
text: Absolutely disgusting. Not only did they serve us old food the manager told me that what I got was the best I was going to get because they were short of staff.

name: Mike Dean
text: The food's good fast delivery

name: Amber Patterson
text: Ordered 2 of the $5 items today,so i ordered a thin crust pepperoni with no crust flavor. So when i picked ordered up first thing I noticed was overwhelming smell of garlic. Then got home and opened it to see a hand tossed crust not thin ‚Ä¶More

text: Tammy was delightful, helpful, and kind! The staff were all polite and friendly

name: Shaun Jackson
text: Loved this place at one time. But they cheated me out of wings. And called me a liar

name: Christie Hutchins
text: Great customer service polite and seemed to care

name: kaylub bagley
text: This one (the armurchee location)is much better than the one on martha berry close to Kaufman tires.

name: logan reagan
text: Hit and miss.  Good pizza one week, next week pizza had wrong toppings, soggy doe and refused to refund Money.  Needs New management.

name: Steven Bennett
text: The two guys working tonight went out their way to make my visit perfect when the Pizza hut online ordering goofed up my order thanks guys for the hard work!

name: Adam T
text: Wish I could give it 0 stars. They said they couldn't deliver to my house because it's not in their area. I live ten minutes away! They have some half-witted excuse about their computer not pulling up certain locations, as if their delivery boys don't have GPS. Guess I live on the wrong side of Hillbilly Lane.
